sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comthhttpmonloginfo ( SYS_ID /* */ , SITE_URL /* */ , WEBSVC_KND /* */ , HTTP_STTUS_CODE /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , LOG_INFO /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LOG_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #sysId# /* */ , #siteUrl# /* */ , #websvcKnd# /* */ , #httpSttusCode# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #logInfo# /* */ , #mngrNm# /* */ , #mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #logId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comthhttpmonloginfo SET SYS_ID=#sysId# /* */ , SITE_URL=#siteUrl# /* */ , WEBSVC_KND=#websvcKnd# /* */ , HTTP_STTUS_CODE=#httpSttusCode# /* */ , CREAT_DT=#creatDt# /* */ , LOG_INFO=#logInfo# /* */ , MNGR_NM=#mngrNm# /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES=#mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LOG_ID=#logId# /* */ WHERE SYS_ID=#sysId# /* */ AND LOG_ID=#logId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comthhttpmonloginfo WHERE SYS_ID=#sysId# /* */ AND LOG_ID=#logId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT SYS_ID /* */ , SITE_URL /* */ , WEBSVC_KND /* */ , HTTP_STTUS_CODE /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , LOG_INFO /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LOG_ID /* */ FROM comthhttpmonloginfo WHERE SYS_ID=#sysId# /* */ AND LOG_ID=#logId# /* */

SELECT SYS_ID /* */ , SITE_URL /* */ , WEBSVC_KND /* */ , HTTP_STTUS_CODE /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , LOG_INFO /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LOG_ID /* */ FROM comthhttpmonloginfo WHERE 1=1
SYS_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
SITE_URL LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY SYS_ID DESC /* */ , LOG_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comthhttpmonloginfo WHERE 1=1
SYS_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
SITE_URL LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
